info.name: Workflowy - Expanded Notes
info.description: Just expands the notes to always show their content
info.additionalInfo:
Code taken from I took some parts from seanwcom's "Workflowy.com - Misc CSS Changes" - http://userstyles.org/styles/58901/workflowy-com-misc-css-changes and cut out to only do the notes.

I hope this use of the code is ok, I do not claim that this work is my own, I just wanted to collapse and expand the notes at will.
